# rehype-remove-duplicate-attribute-values

Remove duplicates in attribute values with unique tokens.

## Install

```sh
npm install rehype-remove-duplicate-attribute-values
```

## Example

##### In

```html
<div class="foo foo"></label>
```

##### Out

```html
<div class="foo"></div>
```
